description.value: You're familiar with the basic spells that most educated merfolk know. Once per day, you can cast either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Create Water] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hydraulic Push] as a 1st-rank primal innate spell. Each time you cast create water, you choose if you create fresh water or salt water.
